title: John Yoo, "Defender in Chief: Donald Trump's Fight for Presidential Power"
description:
University of California, Berkeley law professor and former deputy assistant attorney general in the George W. Bush administration John Yoo weighs in on presidential powers and the U.S. Constitution.
